aspecttable.name: NS-2008
aspecttable.reference: Conrail aspects as described in the January 2008 version of the NS Operating Rules Book - 271-272'.

revision.revremark: Added Conrail references and aspect numbers

aspect.name: Approach Limited
aspect.indication: Proceed approaching the next signal at Limited Speed.

aspect.name: Limited Clear
aspect.indication: Proceed at Limited Speed until entire train clears all interlocking, controlled point or spring switches; then proceed at authorized speed.

aspect.name: Approach Medium
aspect.indication: Proceed, approaching the next signal at Medium Speed.

aspect.name: Advance Approach
aspect.indication: Proceed prepared to stop at the second signal. Trains exceeding Limited Speed must begin reduction to Limited Speed as soon as engine passes the Advance Approach signal.

aspect.name: Medium Clear
aspect.indication: Proceed at Medium Speed until entire train clears all interlocking, controlled point or spring switches; then proceed at authorized speed.

aspect.name: Medium Approach Medium
aspect.indication: Proceed at Medium Speed until entire train clears all interlocking, controlled point or spring switches, then approach the next signal at Medium Speed. Trains exceeding Medium Speed must begin reduction to Medium Speed as soon as the Medium Approach Medium signal is clearly visible.

aspect.name: Approach Slow
aspect.indication: Proceed, approaching next signal at Slow Speed. Trains exceeding Medium Speed must at once reduce to that speed.

aspect.name: Approach
aspect.indication: Proceed prepared to stop at the next signal. Train exceeding Medium Speed must at once reduce to that speed.

aspect.name: Medium Approach
aspect.indication: Proceed prepared to stop at the next signal. Trains exceeding Medium Speed must begin reduction to Medium Speed as soon as the Medium Approach signal is clearly visible.

aspect.name: Slow Clear
aspect.indication: Proceed at Slow Speed until entire train clears all interlocking, controlled point or spring switches, then proceed at authorized speed.

aspect.name: Slow Approach
aspect.indication: Proceed prepared to stop at the next signal. Slow Speed applies until entire train clears all interlocking, controlled point or spring switches, then Medium Speed applies.

aspect.name: Restricting
aspect.indication: Proceed at Slow Speed until entire train clears all interlocking, controlled point or spring switches, then proceed at authorized speed.
